metadata.name: The Voices of Spirits #1
metadata.description:
This 2:08 minute piece is a collaboration between ModernVintagePhotos and House of Breaking Glass. HoBG is an incredible artist who has worked with the who's who of the music industry including work on more than a dozen platinum albums!

"The Voices of Spirits" collection is quintessential work from ModernVintagePhotos in collaboration with four incredible sound artists House of Breaking Glass, Pete Burkeet, SoundwavesPhoton and Amit Sharma. When interacting with these works, the sophisticated viewer and listener will be taken on a journey into their own consciousness and the energy of the Human Spirit, gifted to us by the Universe.
